Generation VIII.Sword: Its shell is overflowing with its heightened otherworldly energy. The ectoplasm serves as protection for this Pokémon's core spirit.
Generation VIII.Shield: Be cautious of the ectoplasmic body surrounding its soul. You'll become stiff as stone if you touch it.
Giant's Mirror , South Lake Miloch , Stony Wilderness , Watchtower Ruins ( Max Raid Battle )
Generation VIII.Shield Expansion Pass: Slippery Slope , Old Cemetery , Giant's Foot , Frigid Sea , Ballimere Lake ( Max Raid Battle )
